thread.section_title: Hotel Pas de Calais - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect in every way
thread.title_full: Perfect in every way - Review of Hotel Pas de Calais, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: ian573
title: Perfect in every way
text:
I would think my wife and I have stayed in this hotel about seven or eight times and we will keep coming back ! In every respect it is perfect - it is quiet, the staff are very friendly and helpful, the rooms are comfortable and well equipped and the location in Saint-Germain-des-Pres could not be better.
We love it !
